item.description: Drew Sommer B.S. in Computer Science, Athabasca University Email drwsommer@gmail.com · Web drew-s.github.io · Linkedin linkedin.com/in/drewlsommer · Github github.com/drew-s Software Engineer Go Git Typescript Angular Nodejs SQL Summary I am a passionate software engineer who loves to be given a challenge to overcome. Arguably, my strongest skill is my ability to quickly learn new technologies and problem solve issues. My deep understanding of computer science gives me the ability to rapidly adapt to the new frameworks and languages.
